website_summaries.verdict: This absorbent 3-ply toilet paper is very soft and gets the job done, sold as a 48-pack for a solid stock-up.
pros: While this toilet paper is incredibly soft, it doesn’t leave behind any linty residue like many competing brands do
These squares are 3-ply for extra absorbency and comfort
Made of completely flushable and septic-safe materials
cons: It is occasionally difficult to unravel the start of a roll

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of TP.
customer_reviews.text: So, here's the deal,this is the best toilet paper. It is the softest. It doesn't leave "lint" : O And the design isn't flowers and hearts-just a subtle square. I don't know how many people actually read a toilet paper review, but if you do, perhaps you care about these qualities like I do. I used to buy whatever was on sale. After trying this, I won't buy anything else. Also, it's important to know, Quilted Northern "ultra soft and strong" is not the same. It's not as thick or soft. Quilted Northern Ultra Plush is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: One Roll Would Last One Day
customer_reviews.text: What is up with the revamping of toilet paper? The rolls are either too massive to fit in a standard toilet paper holder or cylindrical toilet-side storage bin ("Mega," "Supreme"), or, like these, are so puny that a roll wouldn't last a small family HALF A DAY. Surely this isn't what most people WANT?!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya G. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I wish I read the other reviews before buying this what it looks like is a "counterfit" of the regular brand I buy in the stores. FIRST of ALL. It states is double roll? nahhhh I don't think so. The rolls are going to go sooo fast. They are so little and weak. I WOULD NEVER BUY THIS BRAND ONLINE AGAIN! Be aware of fake brands. Or perhaps is the brand itself playing all of us out. I wasn't born yesterday!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Veganizeit

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: My whole family and I love this toilet paper but it is quite pricey in the supermarket so when it was $25 for 48 double rolls we jumped at it. Upon arrival, we were disappointed to see that this was in fact false advertisement....these were single rolls. We did not return them because well we needed toilet paper. See the picture for a comparison of the double roll quilted northern bought at the supermarket versus the supposed double roll quilted northern that arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: These are not the double rolls that I was receiving before.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bizarrely, instead of 48 rolls of Quilted Northern, I received 24 rolls of Angel Soft!!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL WATKINS

customer_reviews.title: Toilet paper arrived dirty, stained and in poor shape, stay away from this brand
customer_reviews.text: See photos. Toilet paper arrived dirty, in really poor shape, and stained. It's hard to see the patchy discoloration on the photos, but every toilet paper roll I checked, has light yellow stains everywhere, sometimes dark patches. When I sniff them, they have this oily and stale smell. I have no idea what happened in the factory, but if the quality control has the incompetence to let this through I have absolutely zero trust in what else this company puts out to their customers. What a waste of paper and energy, please do yourself a favor and stay away from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: In NO way double roll
customer_reviews.text: This is false advertising at its best. These are in NO WAY even close to being a double roll! I thought this was a great purchase until I opened the package. If I were to spend the extra money in a grocery or drug store, I would be able to see the "double" of the roll. These are single rolls at most. Don't be fooled into spending the money for the "double" roll!!
customer_reviews.author: ThisSiteHasAll

customer_reviews.title: Just get the ones from the store
customer_reviews.text: There’s no way around it - I’ve purchased these and the jumbo rolls at least three times now from Amazon and they aren’t remotely the same size or quality as their store-sold counterparts. Exact same packaging and name, so you’d expect the same product and quality - but that’s simply not the case. They are visibly smaller in diameter, the softness isn’t the same, and the overall feel is cheaper. I’m not sure how Quilted Northern or Amazon gets around this bit of marketing magic, but there you have it. Overall, it’s not terrible toilet tissue. But if you’re expecting the exact same product you’d be getting from the supermarket, you’ll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SRG

customer_reviews.title: Double Roles, What a Joke -
customer_reviews.text: Double Roles, what a joke. They even reduced the width of the role. I'll never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Not much paper!
customer_reviews.text: Product looked good and I bought it. Problem is there isn't much of it. Rolls are small and you need a lot of it each time. Don't recommend this. Hard to see on the product details if the rolls are small.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: *****WARNING******
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS GENERIC TISSUE!! I am on save & subscribe for this item, the box looks the same as "Quilted Northern Ultra Plush Toilet Paper, 48 Double Rolls"..... BUT, what's inside are mega rolls that is of generic quality, and clearly NOT Northern tissue. Amazon & customers got duped on this one.
customer_reviews.author: rewind

customer_reviews.title: Not a great deal
customer_reviews.text: I buy this brand in the store, so when I saw this price I was excited to save a little money purchasing this through my subscribe and save. However, when I received it, it was not the same. It seemed thinner and not as soft. My family was definitely going through a roll a lot quicker. I removed it off my subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rothenburg

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Nothing Equivalent! Its the basic rolls sold at Safeway & other supermarkets. Thought it would be similar to the kind sold at Costco warehouse but now unavailable there. Any thinner then you'd have to double up.
customer_reviews.author: nantamco

customer_reviews.title: Toilet Paper
customer_reviews.text: The beginning of the roll is hard to unravel and paper is left on the end of the roll. Toilet paper is wasted at both ends. Grade: B-
customer_reviews.author: David Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Fake - not Northern Quilted that you buy from store!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst toilet paper I’ve ever used. It’s not the same Northern Quilted that you buy in the store. If it’s two ply, you can’t tell. And the tissue breaks apart and shreds. It’s terrible! I bought a box of this and I’m considering just throwing away the two other unused packages because it’s that bad. Terrible!!!!!!! Real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible!! Might as well buy the cheapest stiff on the market. It feels like 1 ply. We used to buy quilted northern at Costco and it was the best toilet paper. So I decided to try buying it through amazon and was excited. This is super thin and you have to use double the amount. Definitely will never buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Roll too large for roller
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for years in supermarkets, from Staples and Amazon in larger quantities. However lately all of the reviews have been complaining that the rolls will no longer fit on standard toilet rollers because they are too big and thick. I will find another brand if this is true because I do not plan to remodel my bathrooms to accommodate this size. Nor will I use some of each role so they will all fit later when needed. AND they have not removed the Reviews from the previous product so you need to look at newest reviews. Sorry, another instance of a manufacturer making decisions based on their need not the consumers
customer_reviews.author: BILLY

customer_reviews.title: Annoyingly weak toilet paper.
customer_reviews.text: Really don't like this stuff. It shreds basically every time you try to tear a piece off, so you wind up with those long bits of toilet paper hanging off the roll. Gets dust all over everything and runs out really fast, because it's so weak that I wind up using more than I would of other brands. This is probably the weakest 2-ply I've ever used. It's soft I guess, but it's soft to the point where it just disintegrates as soon as you touch it, let alone try to use it.
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: The toilet paper is disgusting. It’s covered in grey stuff and looks dirty. I thought it might have just been one of the 4 packages. No, it’s in all of them on every roll. Highly disappointed. No one in my house is using this. 🤢🤮🤢 how could anyone think this is ok to send to a customer.
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Standard size (small rolls); Manufacturer issue not seller.
customer_reviews.text: Product is as stated. I took a chance hoping the rolls would be larger. Not the sellers fault but double rolls are definitely not "mega" rolls. They remind me of the standard size that was always sold before all the advertising changed to "ultra, mega...etc.). Just a plain roll of toilet paper and in a houseful of people and guests it goes fast. Would probably not order this particular product size/package again unless desperate! All that being stated: The product shipped and arrived on time and again was as stated. No concerns otherwise. Manufacturer issue (if you want to call it that), not seller issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value if you compare
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine. I thought I was getting a good deal. Compare the sheets per roll against other brands. Also, they are much smaller than Costco toliet paper
customer_reviews.author: Marnie Blake

customer_reviews.title: worthless
customer_reviews.text: I could have bought genierc and got better than this. Small ribbons in betweem rolls did not tear at the same time
customer_reviews.author: K F

customer_reviews.title: Not Like the Store Bought Version
customer_reviews.text: I was rather disappointed in this option, they say they are double rolls, but we seriously could go through a roll in a day and we're a family of four with three different bathrooms. I likely won't buy it again. They certainly are a comfy and strong tissue, but we went through it way too fast.
customer_reviews.author: K. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Run out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I don't enjoy how small these rolls are. Even though they are "triple strength", my housemates and I need to use just as much TP. These run out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Crap for your crap
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst choices ive ever made in life. Ill stick with costco from now on. Terrible TP which was gone in a flash. 2 adult 1 teen household and probably a roll if not more used each day which is ridiculous. Takes 2 rolls of costco TP for a fill week!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: More of a Kudos to the Seller
customer_reviews.text: This was our second order through this seller. This order was messed up badly, a situation actually out of their control, but they responded immediately, took care of our order in a timely manner with a very professional demeanor. These are the kind of people you want to do business with. Stuff happens and when you know you can count on individuals to handle situations and fulfill their orders without any hassle, they are the keepers. This Covid-19 toilet paper frenzy of the past few months boggles ones mind. Highly recommended. We love this brand of toilet paper and the fact it's sold in bulk. Lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Fox

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Get What I Ordered
customer_reviews.text: The product description is of double rolls. They sent mega-rolls which do NOT fit on my toilet paper holders. They clearly do not bother to accurately describe what they are going to provide and misrepresent what they are selling in ways that, at least in our case given the toilet paper holders we have in our house, makes the produce less usable.
customer_reviews.author: Professor44

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the changes made
customer_reviews.text: width of t.p. has been shortened; the quantity of paper and the quality has gone down. Maybe I'll try another brand if you don't bring back the original product. Don't cheat the buyers....we're smarter than that.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Small rolls
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with the other reviews - although the sheets are soft and comfortable, it seems like we go through a roll a day. I could not see any "# of sheets" in the pictures, but the packaging I received says 154 3-ply sheets per roll. I did not count them to see if that was accurate. Price is better than the store I go to. I did not see any other size options except for the SUPREME which will not fit my dispensers,
customer_reviews.author: Rick K.

customer_reviews.title: Very little paper on the roll
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. The rolls are too small and there is very little paper. It is thick and absorbent but I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Leaves behind lumps of TP everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toilet paper for our family of five and am really disappointed in the quality. I kept finding bits of used toilet paper on the floor in front of all the toilets and sometimes even found clumps stuck to me in the shower. When the toilet paper gets wet (and hello, it is there to clean up urine...) it pills up into little rolls that then fall off your body. You need a flushable wet wipe to clean up the toilet paper after you use the toilet paper to wipe. Gross. Switched to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: CRSeeleys

customer_reviews.title: Not very big rolls
customer_reviews.text: The rolls are not as big as the tissue I purchase at Target, nor as wide. Small amount on each roll so we go through them very fast. love the tissue and would not use anything but Northern Ultra Plush but was disappointed in the amount of tissue on each roll. Will not purchase again on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Special ordered the DOUBLE rolls because the Mega rolls don’t fit my holders. Guess what - they sent Mega rolls anyway... sigh.
customer_reviews.author: patduino

customer_reviews.title: Rolls are so loose, you'll be changing every 2 days!
customer_reviews.text: At first this seemed like a good value. Forget it. Not only does it have a lot of lint/fuzz, but the rolls are so loose that you will be replacing rolls several times a week. You know they've bad when you grab a roll and your fingers almost touch through the toilet paper. Never buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Juju B.

customer_reviews.title: Know how many rows it takes to make a mega.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 double roll of northern quilted ultra plush. I got 2 mega rolls when I should have gotten 3. 2 doubles equals 1 mega.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I will continue to order!!! I am extremely happy with this purchase. I only buy household goods items in bulk so this purchase was a no brainer for me! Definitely worth the buy if you don't like running to the store constantly. So convenient and straight to your door!!!! I made an order a month ago and still haven't finished the first pack!
customer_reviews.author: Brianah Weston

customer_reviews.title: False advertising on size of roll
customer_reviews.text: Double rolls, what a laugh. These rolls are smaller than the regular rolls you can buy in a store. When figuring cost, keep in mind you’re getting a total of 24 rolls (if that), not the 48 they claim.
customer_reviews.author: dinsy53

customer_reviews.title: These rolls ran out so quickly
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I am used to another brand, but I felt like I was constantly refilling these rolls. They were fine - not super soft, but not scratchy. They just seemed small and we went through them really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie L

customer_reviews.title: Not like the original
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it’s fake or what cause we bought it before in a store and it was different. This one is the word toilet paper I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliia C

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I just received this an hour ago. What a disappointment! I compared it with what I can buy at my local Sam's club and was shocked at just how SMALL and light weight the rolls are in comparison. Buy your Quilted Northern locally, this purchase is a RIP OFF!! And I say this as someone who is almost always delighted with the value and quality I receive from my Amazon.com purchases!!!
customer_reviews.author: Swimmer2010

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on soft Double rolls
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on this brand and quality! These are the double roll, which aren’t as big as mega rolls, and the only size that works in my old ‘40s era house. Soft and good quality toilet paper 🧻 Ever better deal thanks to subscribe and save. I’m keeping my auto-order 👍
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: What happened to the size of each roll? Reduced by at least 1/3 the size. This is one way to look like the consumer is getting a deal, only to find the price is the same for far less quantity. Very disappointed in this "hope you don't notice" practice.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Not Double Rolls!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, I've used it for years. Having said that there is no way these are double rolls. I almost laughed when I opened the box. These are single rolls which makes the price crazy for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie-Q

customer_reviews.title: The product was misleading on how large they were or how big the roles were
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product the Northern tissue paper it stated it was two ply and double rolled. The roles were very tiny will not buy again refuse to buy again misleading
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to description
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't play close enough attention when ordering. This package is not double rolls. They say it is but it is regular single rolls to me. (My opinion) These rolls go fast! I will look for Mega rolls in the future.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: It's Northern, which i have used for years
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the local store prices, putting this on subscribe and save does save me money. I like it better than the other brands. My ex always preferred Charmin, but I find Northern to be soft without putting my finger through it. I never run out as I get a case every other month.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Clogged Sewer
customer_reviews.text: The toilet paper is great, except that it caused a major clog in my sewer line. I only flush toilet paper, and this doesn't break down as necessary to flow through the sewer system.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I specifically wanted Double rolls rather than the Mega rolls. So I expected 48 Double rolls and they shipped 24 Mega rolls, probably figuring it as an acceptable substitute It's NOT. If I wanted Mega rolls I would order Mega rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Strong & soft
customer_reviews.text: Northern’s my favorite. I hate cheap, thin, rough toilet paper. This is both strong & soft. Price fluctuates so sometimes a better value than other times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating toilet paper.
customer_reviews.text: Every. Single. Roll. Each time we start a new roll, half of it unravels because of the starter piece. Most rolls you just grab and go. This caused a huge mess with each and every roll...each time we thought it was okay, it would partially rip. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R

customer_reviews.title: scam
customer_reviews.text: this is the second time it has happened. I ordered 48 double rolls and was sent 24 mega rolls of toilet paper. they don't even fit into my toilet paper holder. and the price was almost $4 a roll!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big News
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy having all of your neighbors know what is going on in your bathroom, this is just what you need. It comes in a large box with bold lettering on 5 of 6 sides telling all the world that there is QUILTED NORTHERN inside. Imagine the envy if you lived in Russia. Too bad they didn't think to proudly announce this important news on the bottom of the box! A very short sighted omission.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: YIKES! MINIATURE TOILET PAPER
customer_reviews.text: THOUGHT I WOULD GET THE 4.5" X 4.5" SHEETS LIKE PAST ORDERS....NO 4" X 4"!!! THIS IS RIDICULOUS, LOOKS HORRIBLE ON WALL HOLDER.
customer_reviews.author: BILL

customer_reviews.title: NO CLINKERS!!!
customer_reviews.text: One the finest products that I have ever used to wipe my ass after taking a nice dump
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Formhals

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: One roll only lasts about 2 days and it’s just me using it and I work full time, which means I’m not using it very much. It is very soft, but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Reavy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The box that I purchased looked like the rolls fell off the line onto the floor packaged dirty to the customer poor quality control!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Williams

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: Got my usual subscribe and save shipment today but every single pack was opened and dirty. The Box they came in was fine. Had to have happened in the Manufacturing facility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paper products delivered! Absolutely a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Quilted Northern Ultra Plush double rolls are great quality. Being able to have bulk everyday used products delivered to the door is wonderful! These are not the mega sized last forever type rolls but the quality and amount for the price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: DSham

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same Quilted Northern I purchase at Sams, the roll is much smaller, narrower and very small. I did not know that Quilted Northern had different qualities of paper? Will not be purchasing this At Amazon ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for us
customer_reviews.text: Not like buying it in the store. Way thinner and doesn't last as long. won't be buying this anymore. I don't get why there's such a difference in quality
customer_reviews.author: SB2013

customer_reviews.title: soze matters
customer_reviews.text: Most stares re now carrying the single rolls or the maga rolls. Mega rolls to NOT fit in teh 'in the wall mounted' toilet paper rolls..They were put i when the house was built, and so you are limited on size. These fit just fine. It is a triple ply double roll and fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Nichols

customer_reviews.title: My steady choice.
customer_reviews.text: Good balance between number of uses per roll, length required per usage, lack of harshness, and strength.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Not double rolls
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a double roll. I've been buying what was advertised for years and this ain't it.
customer_reviews.author: dracula

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I sure appreciate Quilted Northern more now that there isn’t any to be found, thanks to the Coronavirus. It’s kinda hard to believe that people would buy so much toilet paper that nobody knows when it’ll be in stock again. Oh well, this too will pass :)
customer_reviews.author: catsRcool

customer_reviews.title: Layers don't stay together
customer_reviews.text: Picture the wonderful tp you have at the corporate office. just roll it into 2 layers and hope the layer will stay together
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable softness
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper is incredible. I started buying it when my other brand was no longer stocked. Wow!!! Everyone loves it and it's now the household favorite. Of course, now we have the toilet paper shortage of 2020 going on, so I can't get it at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't give a 0. I like northern quilted. Would have liked it more if it was delivered. Disappointed in Amazon's delivery service
customer_reviews.author: Debbie in FL

customer_reviews.title: Soft and gentle
customer_reviews.text: I’m so picky about toilet paper and I think I have found the brand that I will continue to rebuy. This product is so soft and gentle. The best part is the mega rolls last soooooooo much longer than other brands that I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper lasts longer than a lot of the cheap brands but with a good price so you feel like you’re using more expensive toilet paper
customer_reviews.author: Justkaren11

customer_reviews.title: Not double rolls!
customer_reviews.text: These are not double rolls as advertised. Thus the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TP
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best TP on the market. It's a big old thick roll that you won't spin off in a day. Very little Lent. Give them a try, you won't be sorry. They have come a long way since the corn cob.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Double???
customer_reviews.text: These rolls are so small they last about 2 days in our house of 4. I almost laughed when I pulled the first roll out of the package because they seem miniature. How are these called double rolls?!?! Canceling my subscribe and save order.
customer_reviews.author: Oldmom

customer_reviews.title: 3-ply is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: I buy a case every chance I get. White Cloud and other 3-ply toilet tissues have gone the way of the dodo. Best to stock up on the only brand left unless you want to keep punching finger holes in the paper when you wipe.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS LISAK

customer_reviews.title: Extra plush means extra flush.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough paper on a roll. It seems the roll is finished quickly with routine use in a two member household. Very disapointing. It is very soft, but not a good value for the money. Won't buy it again..
customer_reviews.author: Cholly

customer_reviews.title: Small rolls
customer_reviews.text: Small rolls and it breaks easily. Not what I purchase in store
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Miller

customer_reviews.title: Too much to flush
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, and I wanted to order more. I am not a hoarder, but the price of ALL toilet paper and paper towels have shot up. Price gouging is immoral. I can't go out because of the pandemic. Otherwise, I would go to my local stores. But I won't pay the high price.
customer_reviews.author: debra dorfman

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I like this toilet paper, nice & soft , 3 ply. I am updating my review after using this item! this is not the same TP paper that I ordered this first time. Not soft at all rather rough in fact. I do think that this item is advertised incorrectly. I sure will not order again!
customer_reviews.author: Floyd J Roe

customer_reviews.title: do you want to have shat come up your bathtub?
customer_reviews.text: If you want to have shat come up your bathtub and to have to call a plumber, this will be your toilet paper. It simply does not dissolve in the pipes. Once you have been through enough of these, you'll see what I mean. It takes some time, but you'll see!
customer_reviews.author: Perturber

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: 24 rolls of toilet paper. pretty good buy. i would recommend. waiting to go through a roll to see if these make you use more toilet paper. i will update this review update: it’s a bit easy to go through a roll. :( moving down to 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: salma

customer_reviews.title: Sorry Can't give a happy Review
customer_reviews.text: Im wondering if anyone else has noticed that the toilet paper roll seems bigger these days. We went thru a roll every other day. Sadly will not be making this purchase again. IMHO not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Nudd

customer_reviews.title: It feels good but they sell it in large quantities because you use at too much
customer_reviews.text: Soft tissue paper but my god we use 1-2 rolls a day for 2 people. Way too much needed to get the job done. And it’s so fluffy there isn’t much on the roll. Will go back to Scott’s
customer_reviews.author: Nixy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - 100% Markup - for richest man in the world?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pre-Covid for $23.99. 4 months later it is $47, about 100% markup? It's good TP - but not liquid gold. 5 stars for quality, 1 star for 100% markup.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Lerner

customer_reviews.title: Ha Ha, I got TP before it all ran out
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on the early onset. Why cant they make more???
customer_reviews.author: cowboy

customer_reviews.title: This is so convenient!!
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying this product from now on. I was worried if it would be worth the money. I'm a senior, who shops using public transportation and it can be a hassle to carry large items or multiple bags on the bus. This purchase simplified everything since it was shipped to me and now I don't worry about running out. Amazon rocks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megademon

customer_reviews.title: Not Double Rolls as Stated!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed - These were NOT Double rolls - I would not buy again from here and I should have bought from Costco as I normally do :-(
customer_reviews.author: ArieBaby06

customer_reviews.title: They did not ship what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered double-sized rolls. They shipped mega-size. They don't fit the holder in my bathroom. And by the way, "We Love Our Clients" is Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: doubleknitter

customer_reviews.title: A great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this is delivered to your door. Big, bulky items are difficult to bring home from the grocery store, and they charge more. The fact that I don't have to leave home for this item is a plus. Shhhhh, don't tell anybody.
customer_reviews.author: VBOHara

customer_reviews.title: THE Blue Package is Better, This is TOO SOFT!!
customer_reviews.text: Too, too soft. It breaks up and leaves lint on the floor. The Quilted Northern in the Blue Package is FANTASTIC! I won't get the purple package again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Tissue ~ 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: My roommates and I have bought this tissue for last one or two years, it’s thick and comfortable to skin. The only small shortcoming is it’s not good for wiping face, and my roommates usually buy another more expensive one for wiping face. But overall I will give it 5 stars, highly recommend! :-D
customer_reviews.author: Zhangyue He

customer_reviews.title: It is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: They are shorter rolls and it says double rolls so like 48 rolls. We are two family household and go through a roll a day. I buy the Kirkland from Costco, 24 rolls and they last us almost two months. So will never purchase these again. Wish I could give them no stars for overall rating.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Turner

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: These are not the large rolls. You get 24, I think, of the smaller rolls. I wanted the big rolls. We just moved to a small town where these are not readily available. I won't buy them again. Good value though.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These rolls are MUCH smaller than the ones at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Well I have course use it to go to the bathroom.!! Yeah I like it because it soft
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Schell

customer_reviews.title: The TP my family prefers at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is the preferred TP of my family. We enjoy the softness and feel like it works well. The triple rolls don't fit on all of our TP holders so we prefer the double rolls. It lasts just find for us and doesn't tear while we use it which is super important to me. This is where I go to restock!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy from Costco
customer_reviews.text: I’m used to Costco size packaging and roll sizes. This didn’t match by half and was more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: kjg

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite toilet paper, and this is a pretty good deal. The individual rolls are smaller than the packs you can buy in the store, but it's still a decent deal.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, little rolls,  not accurate description
customer_reviews.text: Says double roll, I have pictures compared to the Costco toilet paper, it's about half the size, so tiny, doesn't seem like very much, not what we're used to. But it was a corona crisis and i had no choice but to order online.
customer_reviews.author: sascha starr

customer_reviews.title: Goes quick
customer_reviews.text: Is not equal to 96 rolls at all goes fast. Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The rolls are soft but small. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen B.

product_meta.title: Quilted Northern Ultra Plush Toilet Paper, 48 Double Rolls, 48 = 96 Regular Rolls, 3 Ply Bath Tissue, 4 Pack of 12 Rolls
product_meta.description: Silky, smooth, and soft, Quilted Northern Ultra Plush toilet paper offers 3 silky layers of comfort for the clean feel you expect and the luxurious feel you desire. Quilted Northern Ultra Plush bath tissue is the only premium toilet paper with 3 layers of tissue. The Quilted Northern signature emboss delivers the softness and strength you love. Quilted Northern Ultra Plush toilet paper is flushable and septic safe for standard sewer and septic systems. Quilted Northern toilet paper is Sustainable Forestry Initiative (SFI) certified. For more than 100 years, Quilted Northern bathroom tissue has stood for softness, strength, and overall quality and comfort. Get this brand you can trust delivered to your door for up to 15 percent less with subscribe and save option. This is a bulk pack of 48 Quilted Northern Ultra Plush double toilet paper rolls, equivalent to 96 regular rolls. Each roll has 154 sheets for fewer roll changes. The rolls are sized to fit standard dispensers.
feature_bullets: Silky, smooth, and soft, quilted northern ultra plush toilet paper offers 3 silky layers of comfort for the clean feel you expect and the luxurious feel you desire
Quilted Northern ultra plush bath tissue is the only premium toilet paper with 3 layers of tissue; The Quilted Northern signature emboss delivers the softness and strength you love
Quilted Northern ultra plush toilet paper is flushable and septic safe for standard sewer and septic systems; Quilted Northern toilet paper is Sustainable Forestry Initiative (SFI) Certfied

For more than 100 years, quilted Northern bathroom tissue has stood for softness, strength, and overall quality and comfort; Get this brand you can trust delivered to your door for upto 15 percentage less with subscribe and save option

This is a bulk Pack of 48 Quilted Northern Ultra Plush double toilet paper rolls, equivalent to 96 regular rolls; Each roll has 154 sheets for fewer roll changes; The rolls are sized to fit standard dispensers
